title: hello everyone im really broke and i dont have money to buy phone i really like what Google made thx
content:
nothing im searching for work to buy a Google pixel no mater if it was 2 xl or 3 xl or 4 xl my old phone all the time get crash someone told me try to massage Google maby they can help you and send you a gift hhhh who know he was joking ...im broke and dont have money to buy your phone i really loved it like when i see the adds about it im get crazy it was a great work from Google to made this device ...i hope that you read my massage ..thank you .

good night

your huge fan Hassan
